name: build-changelog
description: A CLI to auto-generate a deploy ready changelog
author: Raynos <raynos2@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run jshint && NODE_ENV=test mocha --reporter spec
scripts.shrinkwrap: rm npm-shrinkwrap.json; rm -rf ./node_modules && npm cache clear && npm --registry=http://archive.uber.com/npm install && npm shrinkwrap --depth 100 --dev
